domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

text: @marklevinshow And? It's an anti-malaria drug. Did you find a prescription for Azithromicin, too. That's the dangerous combination. A friend takes hydroxychloroquine for Lupus. Her labs are closely watched. COVID-19 has only been known in humans for about 8 months. This tweet makes zero sense.
